title: What's the biggest thing that's holding you back in League?
body: Mine would definitely have to be my mechanics. I play a lot of bruiser and tank champions, such as Vi, Maokai, Sejuani, Nasus, and Darius. None of those are particularly highly skill-capped, but can succeed in the hands of a player who has good map awareness, decision making, and game knowledge (me). I've tried picking up champions like Vayne, Lee Sin, Riven, and Yasuo, but I never feel confident enough on those champions to make big plays. I prefer consistency.
